scheme_name: Stipend To Students Studying at Govt. Hindi Institute Dimapur
brief_description: The scheme aims to provide financial support to students enrolled at the Government Hindi Institute, Dimapur. Under this scheme, a monthly stipend of ₹400/- is given to student every year from the allocated scholarship fund provided by the State Government.
detailed_description: The scheme "Stipend to Students Studying at Govt. Hindi Institute Dimapur" was launched by the Department of School Education, Government of Nagaland, aims to provide a monthly stipend to students studying at the Government Hindi Institute, Dimapur. The stipend, provided at the rate of ₹400/- per month, is funded annually from the allocated fund under Scholarship by the State Government.
benefits: Students receive a monthly stipend of ₹400/-.
eligibility_criteria: The applicant should be a resident of Nagaland. The applicant should be studying at the Government Hindi Institute in Dimapur.

steps: Eligible applicants can apply for the scheme by contacting the concerned authority at their respective institute.

documents_required: Aadhaar card or other proof of identity Proof of residence Proof of income from the student's family Mark sheets of the previous academic years Admission letter or proof of admission to the Government Hindi Institute in Dimapur Bank account details of the student or the guardian to receive the stipend amount
